whip.name: Whip
whip.description: Whip your enemies at short-range. The whip lifesteals from your enemy.

repeater.description: Every time reloader hits, the cooldown resets and you can shoot it again immediately. Hitting the same enemy again will do 150% damage, and the third time it will do 200% damage (the maximum). Repeater takes 0.4 seconds to grow to full damage, so hit from a distance for maximum effect.
repeater.name: reloader

icewall.name: Wall
icewall.description: Create a wall that reflects projectiles and blocks other acolytes. You can pass through your own wall, but other acolytes cannot, even if they are using teleport.

shield.name: shield
shield.description: Reflect away projectile attacks. Ineffective against area-of-effect weapons.

gun.name: Gun
gun.description: Your garden veriety gun. Hold to aim, release to fire. Contrary to popular belief, aiming does not make you do more damage.

effects.title: Interruptible
effects.text: If you take an enemy hit, gun will be interrupted.

sixshooter.name: Six Shooter
sixshooter.description: As the name would suggest, it shoots 6 bullets. also gives you a small speed boost

railgun.name: Snipe Shot
railgun.description: Huge damage, if your aim is good enough.

grenade.name: Grenade
grenade.description: Throw a grenade that detonates after 5 seconds. Has a fixed range

minigun.name: Bullet Spray
minigun.description: Shoot a stream of bullets in a wide arc. Get closer to focus all your damage onto one target.

shotgun.name: Shotgun
shotgun.description: Fire a blast of multiple bullets. Does knockback and damage.

knife.name: Knife
knife.description: Swing your knife. Why would you bring a knife to a gunfight?

missle.name: Missle Swarm
missle.description: Fire 6 missles that home in on an enemy.

rocketrain.name: Rocket Rain
rocketrain.description: Fire 3 rockets that home in on your cursor. Not a brawl stars reference.

leap.name: Bullet Launch
leap.description: Create three explosions behind you, doing damage and bosting you forward.

flashbang.name: Flashbang
flashbang.description: Throw a bomb that stuns enemies.

biggun.name: Big Gun
biggun.description: A very big gun. As you would expect, this big gun does big damage.

turrent.name: Sentry
turrent.description: Place a sentry that fires 6 shots.

ricochet.name: Ricochet Rounds
ricochet.description: Fire a fast bouncing bullet. Watch out, it can hit you too!

bDash.name: Bullet Dash
bDash.description: Spray bullets everywhere and speed forward.

bombingrun.name: Bombing Run
bombingrun.description: Speed forward, leaving deadly bombs behind you.

kbturrent.name: Water Sentry
kbturrent.description: Place a sentry that sprays compressed water at enemies.

substitute.name: Substitute
substitute.description: Dissapear and leave a substitute in place. The substitute takes greatly reduced knockback.

bombingrun2.name: Bombing Run
bombingrun2.description: Speed forward, leaving deadly bombs behind you.

leap2.name: Leap
leap2.description: Jump over any obstacles and create explosions when you land.

bDash2.name: Bullet Dash
bDash2.description: Spray bullets everywhere and speed forward.
